data.title: The World, the Flesh and the Devil - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The World, the Flesh and the Devil with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
1959

1 hr 35 mins

Drama, Science Fiction

NR

Watchlist

Where to Watch

A Pennsylvania miner, trapped for days in a cave-in, emerges to find that he's the sole survivor of nuclear holocaust, but when he makes his way to New York City he discovers a beautiful woman, and later they are joined by a man who arrived by boat. Harry Belafonte, who stars as the miner, performs three song on the soundtrack.
